alert.note: Alert for Appomattox; Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Appomattox and north central Charlotte Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 759 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Appomattox, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. Frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Appomattox... Red House... Pamplin City... Madisonville... Cullen... Appomattox National Historic Park... and Hixburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
